text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
This race has been chosen for further 
growth…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
For more excellence! I, for one, will
win by a comfortable margin!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I recently learned a new phrase… 
Allow me to tell you what it is!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
――A flash of lightning! 
I think that means fast, anyway!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
You can count on me for 
a lightning-fast run!
